What happens next?

  1. 1Enter your email and receive a 6-digit login code
  2. 2Verify your email with the code
  3. 3Your Silver membership is activated instantly
  4. 4Upgrade to Gold or Platinum anytime from your dashboard

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I join POD N BEYOND Circle?

Simply book your first stay and create an account. You'll automatically be enrolled in Silver tier for free. You can upgrade to Gold or Platinum anytime.

Can I use my membership across all brands?

Yes! Your POD N BEYOND Circle membership works across all our brands - Capsule, Smart, Sanctuary, and Sauna+Sleep.

Do points expire?

Points never expire as long as you have at least one booking every 12 months. Stay active and your points keep growing!

Can I change my tier?

Absolutely! You can upgrade or downgrade your tier anytime from your account dashboard.
